itemDisplayName: Deploy an Azure Health Data Services MedTech service
description: The MedTech service is an optional service of the Azure Health Data Services designed to ingest health data from multiple and disparate Internet of Medical Things (IoMT) devices and normalizes, groups, transforms, and persists device health data in the Fast Healthcare Interoperability Resources (FHIRÂ®) service within an Azure Health Data Services workspace.
summary: This template deploys a MedTech service with the required resources and resource access permissions. The MedTech service will still require device and FHIR destination mappings to be fully functional.
